author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the analyzers to record muons not on event basis but on single muon basis

#### PR validation:

Test using the cfg's in the test area of Calibration/HcalCalibAlgos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca198 Modify the analyzers to record muons not on event basis but on single muon basis
